desc: The Sarasota Dog Salon is home to certified dog groomers. Our low-stress and cage-free grooming has pets pulling you towards our door. Specialty food and products for skin and digestive allergies are in our Pup Stop Pet Supply.

layout.text: DOG GROOMING AND PET RETAIL IN SARASOTA, FL
WELCOME TO THE SARASOTA DOG SALON & PUP STOP
